overview: Known as the pioneer of the chopped and screwed sound, DJ Screw was one of the most prolific and influential hip-hop artists Texas has ever produced. Despite his untimely passing in 2000, the impact of his music lives on. With performance footage, videos, interviews and revealing behind-the-scenes clips, this documentary provides an intimate portrait of the mix-tape superstar and a glimpse into the world of the Screwed Up Click.
title: Soldiers United for Cash
